title: No sound notification (any ringtone) for incoming call
content:
Symptoms:
===========
If I connect the head set then I can hear the ring tone for the call 
Video taken with Camera app plays volume fine. 
Music plays out normally
Cannot hear Alarm Volume
speaker calls are one way (remote able to hear)
changing ringtones is not heard (without the headset)
Slider (Sound settings) on Media/Call Volume makes sound
           while the slider on Ring/Alarm does not

Tried: 
======
Safe mode --- Same issue
Phone reset -- Same issue
Settings>>Apps&Notifications>>All Apps>>3-dot menu>>reset app preferences
Settings -> Apps & notifications -> Advanced -> App permissions -> Microphone  --> Removed all Apps
Turned off Active Edge > Squeeze for silence
Turned off other Gestures
Do not Disturb is not turned on 

Is it possible that lower speakers on the phone has gone bad 
     (as I haye issues with Ringtone, Alarm, loudspeaker)? 

Any other suggestions?
